AuthUIProvider.byContinuingYouAgree: By continuing, you agree to the
AuthUIProvider.protectedByRecaptcha: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA.
AuthUIProvider.sessionNotFresh: Your session is not fresh. Please sign in again.
AuthUIProvider.verifyYourEmailDescription: Please verify your email address. Check your inbox for the verification email. If you haven't received the email, click the button below to resend.
AuthUIProvider.usernameDescription: Enter the username you want to use to log in.
AuthUIProvider.twoFactorTotpLabel: Scan the QR Code with your Authenticator
AuthUIProvider.twoFactorEnableInstructions: Please enter your password to enable 2FA
AuthUIProvider.twoFactorDisableInstructions: Please enter your password to disable 2FA.
AuthUIProvider.twoFactorCardDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
AuthUIProvider.twoFactorDescription: Please enter your one-time password to continue
AuthUIProvider.setPasswordDescription: Click the button below to receive an email to set up a password for your account.
AuthUIProvider.sessionsDescription: Manage your active sessions and revoke access.
AuthUIProvider.signUpEmail: Check your email for the verification link.
AuthUIProvider.signUpDescription: Enter your information to create an account
AuthUIProvider.signInUsernameDescription: Enter your username or email below to login to your account
AuthUIProvider.signInDescription: Enter your email below to login to your account
AuthUIProvider.deleteApiKeyConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?
AuthUIProvider.recoverAccountDescription: Please enter a backup code to access your account
AuthUIProvider.providersDescription: Connect your account with a third-party service.
AuthUIProvider.apiKeyCreatedDescription: Please copy your API key and store it in a safe place. For security reasons we cannot show it again.
AuthUIProvider.createApiKeyDescription: Enter a unique name for your API key to differentiate it from other keys.
AuthUIProvider.apiKeysInstructions: Generate API keys to access your account programmatically.
AuthUIProvider.apiKeysDescription: Manage your API keys for secure access.
AuthUIProvider.passkeysInstructions: Securely access your account without a password.
AuthUIProvider.passkeysDescription: Manage your passkeys for secure access.
AuthUIProvider.nameDescription: Please enter your full name, or a display name.
AuthUIProvider.name: Name
AuthUIProvider.emailOTPVerificationSent: Please check your email for the verification code.
AuthUIProvider.emailOTPDescription: Enter your email to receive a code
AuthUIProvider.magicLinkEmail: Check your email for the magic link
AuthUIProvider.magicLinkDescription: Enter your email to receive a magic link
AuthUIProvider.forgotPasswordEmail: Check your email for the password reset link.
AuthUIProvider.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email to reset your password
AuthUIProvider.emailVerification: Please check your email for the verification link.
AuthUIProvider.emailVerifyChange: Please check your email to verify the change.
AuthUIProvider.emailInstructions: Please enter a valid email address.
AuthUIProvider.emailDescription: Enter the email address you want to use to log in.
AuthUIProvider.disabledCredentialsDescription: Choose a provider to login to your account
AuthUIProvider.deleteAccountNotFresh: You must be recently logged in to delete your account.
AuthUIProvider.deleteAccountVerify: Please check your email to verify the deletion of your account.
AuthUIProvider.deleteAccountInstructions: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
AuthUIProvider.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
AuthUIProvider.changePasswordDescription: Enter your current password and a new password.
AuthUIProvider.backupCodePlaceholder: Enter one of your backup codes. Once used, each code can only be used once and will be invalidated after use.
AuthUIProvider.backupCodesDescription: Save these backup codes in a secure place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your two-factor authentication method.
AuthUIProvider.avatarInstructions: An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
AuthUIProvider.avatarDescription: Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files.
AuthUIProvider.accountsInstructions: Sign in to an additional account.
AuthUIProvider.accountsDescription: Manage your currently signed in accounts.
